description.value:
Your body was originally designed to create works of art, complex tools, or maintain advanced machinery. You become trained in Crafting (or another skill if youâ€™re already trained in Crafting), and you gain the Specialty Crafting skill feat in a specialty of your choice.

  • @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Specialty Crafting (Alchemy)]{Specialty Crafting (Alchemy)}
